text: Mont-de-Laval () is a commune in the Doubs department. It is in the Bourgogne- Franche-Comt√© region in eastern France. ==Geography== The commune is west of Le Russey. ==Population== ==Related pages== * Communes of the Doubs department ==References== ==Other websites== * Mont-de-Laval on the intercommunal Web site of the department Category:Communes in Doubs
